jobs.title: Strategic Partner - Director
jobs.description: Lead our strategic partnerships program, identify new alliance opportunities, and help scale joint go-to-market initiatives. You will work closely with leadership to drive partnership strategy and revenue targets.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: Build and maintain web and data platform components, contribute to API design, and collaborate with product and data teams. Strong JavaScript and backend experience preferred; familiarity with data pipelines is a plus.

jobs.title: Sales Associate
jobs.description: Support the sales team across lead generation, outreach, and deal coordination. You'll help qualify opportunities, manage CRM updates, and prepare materials for client conversations.

jobs.title: Project Manager
jobs.description: Coordinate project delivery across technical and client teams, track milestones, and ensure timely execution. Strong communication skills and experience running analytics or software projects are ideal.
